hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported that Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) used to come to our house and there was perspiration upon his body. My mother brought a bottle and began to pour the sweat in that. When Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) got up he said:Umm Sulaim, what is this that you are doing? Thereupon she said: That is your sweat which we mix in our perfume and it becomes the most fragrant perfume

chapter.ara-name: باب طِيبِ عَرَقِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَالتَّبَرُّكِ بِهِ .
chapter.eng-name: The Fragrance Of His Sweat, And Seeking Blessing Therefrom
